title: AVOCADO EGG SALAD
directions: In a medium bowl, combine the hard boiled eggs and egg whites, avocado, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, green onion, and mustard. Mash with a fork. Season with salt and pepper, to taste.
Serving suggestions: Spread between two slices of bread for an Avocado Egg Salad Sandwich. Eat with crackers, cut up veggies, on toast, or in a wrap. This salad is best eaten the day it's made.
yield: SERVES 3-4 prep time: 5 MINUTES total time: 5 MINUTES
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
